description:
I've always had a thing for guys working out in the buff. So, when the opportunity arose to film at a gym after hours I was really excited. And who better to watch than Diego, our hot little Latin stud.
Diego started out in the locker room and stripped completely down. Then we went out onto the floor where he showed me some of his workout routine (with his big, uncut dick flopping all over the place).
After getting his muscles all pumped up, Diego took a break and jerked a nice load onto his stomach. Then it was off to the treadmill for a little cardio (and for me to watch his spent cock bounce up and down as he ran).
We finished up with a steamy shower and another hot, messy load all over the dressing room bench!
title: Diego's Workout
